hangle: 애초에 피오나가 최종 보스가 된 이유
first_translate: the reason why fiona became the final boss...

hangle: 그것은 어둠과 계약한 힘을 통제하지 못하게 되었기 때문이다.
first_translate: ...was because she lost control over her powers after making a pact with darkness.

hangle: 그녀가 어둠과 계약한 데에는 여러 이유가 있었지만,
first_translate: she had many reasons for doing so,

hangle: 결정적인 요인이 된 인물은 바로 아렌트였다.
first_translate: but the person that made up her mind was none other than arendt.

hangle: 그리고 현재 내가 빙의한 몸은 피오나.
first_translate: and right now I’m possessing fiona’s body.

hangle: 솔직히 아렌트를 까먹고 있던 이유는 간단하다.
first_translate: to be honest, there's a simple reason why I forgot about him.

hangle: 지금까지 내가 시그렌을 너무 신경 쓰고 있었으니까.
first_translate: it’s because all this time, my focus has been on siegren.
siegren...
I didn’t expect arendt, who appears halfway through the story,

hangle: 원작 시작 전인 지금 벌써 내가 있는 곳에 등장할 줄이야.
first_translate: would show up at the place where I am before the actual novel even begins.
with how big the population is here,

hangle: 어떻게 이렇게 아렌트와 운명처럼 마주칠 수가…
first_translate: how did we run into each other like fate--

hangle: 순수하게 확률로 따져도 굉장히 낮을 텐데.
first_translate: even if you look at just probability alone, the chances would have been very low.

hangle: 나는 대체 얼마나 운이 안 좋은거야?!
first_translate: do I really have such bad luck?!
arendt clovis.
his keywords are “schemer” and “bad guy.”
while he treats everyone else like crap,
in front of his lover, he acts sweetly.

hangle: 분명 여주인공 시점으로 읽으면 꽤 재밌고 설레는 인물이다.
first_translate: if you read from the heroine’s point-of-view, he’d probably seem quite charming and exciting.
but as someone looking from outside,
or worse yet, meeting him in real life?
you'd want to get away from him immediately!!!

hangle: 아렌트는 겉모습이랑 달리 성격이 엄청 더럽다구.
first_translate: unlike what people think, arendt actually has a terrible personality.
uhgh, whatever.

hangle: 여차해서 일이 꼬이면 내가 먼저 쟤를 암살해 버려야겠다.
first_translate: if things go wrong, maybe I’ll assassinate him first.

hangle: 날 최종보스로 만들려는 모든 캐릭터를 죽이면
first_translate: if I kill off every character trying to make me become the final boss,

hangle: 나는 선량한 피오나로 살아갈 수 있겠지.
first_translate: then I can live happily ever after as good ol’ fiona.
muahaha!
lady fiona...?
that was quick.
she must only be around 17 or 18 years old.
but it seems like she recognized me.
I never revealed my title,

hangle: 내가 누군지 아는 건 그리 이상한 일은 아니다.
first_translate: but it wouldn’t be strange for anyone to know who I am.

hangle: 난 수도 사교계에 꽤 알려져 있으니까.
first_translate: after all, I'm pretty well-known among high society circles.
still...
that reaction...

hangle: 여태껏 내 얼굴을 보며 그런 표정을 지은 여자는 처음이었어.
first_translate: no woman has ever looked at me like that when they saw my face.

hangle: 게다가 가볍게 손댄 것만으로 마석이 그렇게 변하다니.
first_translate: not to mention, she changed those magic stones by simply touching them lightly.
she must definitely be a powerful magician.
but something weird is...

hangle: 그 정도 솜씨라면 진즉 사교계에도 알려졌을 게 분명한데,
first_translate: a skillful magician like herself would’ve already gained fame within socialite circles,
yet I've never seen her before.
did she say her name was celine...?

hangle: 그 수준의 마법사라면 내가 하려는 일에 필시 도움이 될 거야.
first_translate: a skilled magician like her will surely help me achieve my goal.
I need to find out more information about that noble lady.
don’t leave me behind!
gosh! come back!
this is taking forever!

hangle: 역시 아벨은 이 짓을 하기 싫어서 나한테 떠민 게 분명해.
first_translate: as expected, abel clearly pushed this task onto me since he doesn’t wanna do it himself.
I wish I could confront him right now,

hangle: 아직 아벨과 시그렌이 수도에 도착할 시점까지는 좀 남았지….
first_translate: but abel and siegren still haven’t arrived in the capital yet...
siegren won’t appear in front of the nobles until...

hangle: 분명 꽃 축제의 꽃이 전부 질 무렵이니까.
first_translate: ...the flowers start wilting during the flower festival.
so there’s roughly one month left.
come in.
oh, celine!
my lady, may I see you for a moment?
okay, let me take a break then.
what is it?
celine...
isn’t this dress too fancy for casual outings?
it’s for balls, my lady.
of course...

hangle: 드레스를 이미 잔뜩 맞췄는데 또 맞추자고 해서 뭔가 싶었는데,
first_translate: I thought it was odd that she wanted another custom-made dress despite having plenty already,
and besides...
this is marian tailors, isn’t it?
marian tailors.

hangle: 말 그대로 수도 귀족 영애들에게 동경의 대상인 곳이다.
first_translate: it’s literally the most sought-after tailor shop amongst young ladies in the capital.

hangle: 왜 소설 속에서 그런 곳 있지 않은가.
first_translate: why does such a place exist in novels?
all the young ladies dream of going there,

hangle: 드레스 한 벌 받으려면 몇 달은 기다려야 한다고 설명하는 그런 의상실.
first_translate: but apparently, you have to wait months to receive your order.
but the main characters are always exceptions,

hangle: 밥 먹듯이 드레스를 맞추는 그런 장소.
first_translate: so they’re able to visit whenever they please.
talk about unfairness!

hangle: 여주인 유니스도 이 의상실에서 드레스를 맞추곤 했다.
first_translate: even the protagonist, eunice, used to buy dresses from this store.

hangle: 아마 아렌트가 그녀를 유혹할 때 그런 장면이 있었던 걸로 기억한다.
first_translate: I remember reading scenes where arendt tried seducing her while shopping together.

hangle: 그런 의상실을 이토록 쉽게 이용할 수 있다니.
first_translate: now I can use this tailor shop however I want.

hangle: 과연 헤일론 가문이라고 감탄해야 할 지.
first_translate: I guess being part of house haylon comes with its perks.
wait though...
doesn’t this feel kinda suspicious?
something feels off.
ah... lady fiona...

hangle: 아가씨와 이렇게 옷을 보고 있으니 손녀와 드레스를 보던게 생각나네요.
first_translate: seeing you try on these clothes reminds me of picking out dresses with my granddaughter.

hangle: 이젠 손녀와 그러는 건 힘든 일이지만…
first_translate: it’s hard to spend quality time with her nowadays...

hangle: 그치만 셀린 때문에 이상해도 끽 소리 하나 낼 수가 없어~!!
first_translate: but thanks to celine, I couldn’t complain even if I wanted to!
my lady,

hangle: 의상실 직원들과 할 이야기가 조금 남았는데,
first_translate: I still have some matters to discuss with the employees here.

hangle: 맞은 편의 카페에서 기다려 주실 수 있을까요?
first_translate: can you wait for us across the street at the cafe?
alright, got it.
refreshing!
I never imagined drinking anything cold like this...
...while living in haylon manor.

hangle: 이렇게 맨날 추운 법이 어디 있어~!!
first_translate: where else would it be freezing year-round?!
the weather’s nice today,
and I drank something refreshing...
I needed this change of pace.
glad I came o-

we meet again.
that voice sounds familiar...
duke... arendt.
nice seeing you,
lady celine.
